## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r}
actividad<-read.csv("activity.csv")
acumulado<-aggregate(steps ~ date, actividad, sum)
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

```{r}
hist(acumulado$steps,main="Histogram of Steps",xlab="Steps per day")
```

### Mean: 
```{r}
mean(acumulado$steps)
```

### Median:
```{r}
median(acumulado$steps)
```
